title: How do Android updates for Pixel phones depend on supplier?
content:
https://support.google.com/pixelphone/answer/4457705 says:

“If you bought your device from the Google Store, updates will typically reach your device within 2 weeks. If you bought your device elsewhere, updates can take longer.”

Is this just about devices aquired from certain carriers? Or is there actually a difference in how updates are deployed to Pixel devices aquired from suppliers such as, say, Amazon, and devices aquired from the Google Store?
